item.title: The rise of GenAI in decision intelligence: Trends and tools for 2026 and beyond
item.description: Enterprise Architect focus: **Strategic Digital Transformation & Enterprise-Wide Optimization** Key themes include **AI-driven decision-making**, **hybrid cloud resilience**, and **enterprise-wide agility**â€”balancing legacy systems with modern scalability. Mandatory compliance frameworks (e.g., GDPR, ISO 27001) drive secure, scalable architectures. Cybersecurity-as-a-service integration ensures real-time threat mitigation. Data governance enforces privacy while enabling AI-driven insights. **Zero-trust security models** and **microservices-based agility** underpin high-performance, cost-efficient operations. Focus: **enterprise-wide efficiency, compliance, and innovation**.
